channel.title: Comments on: Open Source and Money (Shame on WordPress and PhotoMatt)

item.title: By: Ezzra
item.dc:creator: Ezzra
item.description:
..and with their recently touted participation in the nofollow project to eliminate search spam.
If you like comedy, it absoutely does not get any better than this!
